sentences.sentence: His intercession could be of help to the tribe.
sentences.translation: 他的调解会对该部落有帮助。

sentences.sentence: Yes, intercession is work, but it has heavenly rewards.
sentences.translation: 是的，代祷是工作，但是它有天国的赏赐。

sentences.sentence: As I spend time in intercession, I will see more conversions.
sentences.translation: 当我花时间代祷时，会看见更多人归向主。
